title: Securing Green
description: DCG is dedicated to developing digital infrastructure for Green projects, starting with the creation of an Environmental Attributes Certificate Registry in Asia. This initiative leverages the unique capabilities of blockchain technology to ensure the credibility and efficiency of its operations.

objectives.name: Define objectives
objectives.description: Clients can set their own specific, measurable and time-bound goals and targets for the company's sustainability efforts or consult the ideas of DCG team.

objectives.name: Identify potential projects
objectives.description: DCG onboards projects verified by 3rd party verifiers to ensure the accuracy and integrity of the green project and addresses durability and project risks.

objectives.name: Build your impact
objectives.description: Projects can set their own specific, measurable and time-bound goals and targets for the company's sustainability efforts or consult the ideas of DCG team.

objectives.name: Assess impact
objectives.description: Gauging environmental impact with digital MOIs. DCG works closely with the project developers to obtain the real-time data on the project's environmental and social impacts to ensure that the impact remain valid as well as verifiable.
